question: Which of the following is correct, in the context of a cricket game, in which each contestant meets all other contestants in turn?
explanation: Round Robin Tournament, in the context of a cricket game, is in which each contestant meets all other contestants in turn. A round-robin tournament or all-play-all tournament is a competition in which each contestant meets all other contestants in turn. A round-robin contrasts with an elimination tournament, in which participants are eliminated after a certain number of losses.
